TinyBRL  1.4
TinyBRL is a C++ open-source library for bayesian reinforcement learning.

Class List
Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
[detail level 1234]
 ▼NddsA namespace gathering the tools and classes related to RL problems with Discrete state space, Discrete action space and Single reward
 ▼NoppsThis namespace gathers OPPS algorithms:
 CStoSOOA StoSOO instance where evaluating the function 'f' consists to test the strategy represented by the center vector of parameters of the part of the domain represented by the node, and play it on a MDP of the given MDP distribution
 CUCB1A UCB1 instance where drawing an arm consists to play the associated strategy an a MDP of the given MDP distribution
 CUCTA UCT instance where drawing an arm from a node consists to draw a strategy from the part of the strategy space defined by this node, and play it on a MDP of the given MDP distribution
 CAgentInterface of an RL agent to address MDPs
 CAgentFactoryInterface of an AgentFactory to generate RL Agents
 CAgentFactoryExceptionException
 CBAMCPAgentA RL Agent following a BAMCP policy
 CBEBAgentA RL Agent following a BEB policy
 CBFS3AgentA RL Agent following a BFS3 policy
 CCModelA Model represented by a set of counters
 CDirMultiDistributionA MDP distribution represented by a Dirichlet Multinomial distribution
 CEGreedyAgentA RL Agent following an e-greedy policy
 CEGreedyAgentFactoryAn AgentFactory which generates EGreedyAgent's
 CExperimentRepresent a RL experiment
 CFormulaAgentA RL Agent following a policy parametrized by a formula
 CFormulaAgentFactoryAn AgentFactory which generates FormulaAgent's (where the formulas are polynomials)
 CFormulaVectorDefines a std::vector of formulas which also add serialization
 CFVariableRepresent a variable for the FormulaAgent's
 CFVariableExceptionException
 CMDPRepresent a MDP problem
 CMDPDistributionInterface of a MDP distribution
 CModelInterface of a model of a MDP
 COPPSCSAgentA RL agent which applies the OPPS meta-learning algorithm during its offline phase (continuous case)
 COPPSDSAgentA RL agent which applies the OPPS meta-learning algorithm during its offline phase (discrete case)
 COptimalAgentA RL agent taking optimal decisions
 CQMeanA variable for the FormulaAgent's, which represents a Q-function based on the mean model of a prior distribution
 CQSelfA variable for the FormulaAgent's, which represents a Q-function based on the 'self' model of a prior distribution
 CQUniformA variable for the FormulaAgent's, which represents a Q-function based on the 'uniform' model of a prior distribution
 CQVarA variable for the FormulaAgent's, which represents a Q-function model-based variable for FormulaAgent
 CRandomAgentA RL agent taking random decisions
 CSBOSSAgentA RL Agent following a SBOSS policy
 CSoftMaxAgentA RL Agent following a soft-max policy
 CSoftMaxAgentFactoryAn AgentFactory which generates SoftMaxAgent's
 CVDBEEGreedyAgentA RL Agent following an vdbe e-greedy policy
 CVDBEEGreedyAgentFactoryAn AgentFactory which generates VDBEEGreedyAgent's

 ▼NsimulationThis namespace gathers several templates related to an RL simulation
